Notes: ranges from (low) a room or apartment that results in housing to serve one person regardless of the number of rooms in the unit to (high) the number of beds Emory fills in a normal semester

Parameter: Time from onset of infectiousness to testing (1/days)
Notes: First day is asymptomatic, so when this value is 2, testing is on first day of disease
Monthly, range is once per semester to daily

Source: Mossong et al; Prem et al

Parameter: Proportion experiencing ILI symptoms per day
Source: Nichol et al; Guh et al

Parameter: On campus students <-> On campus students
